name: Mobility Hub
description:
A sim-game where the player must choose the best environmentally friendly mode of transportation to perform tasks each day while considering timeliness and finances. Help save North Park from greenhouse gas pollution! 

Project created as a part of PoNG Center 2021 Summer Internship in partnership with San Diego Association of Governments (SANDAG).

Programmer : Ryan Wright
Proj. Manager : Joshua Vu
Artist : Wilson Vo
Tester : Nicholas Angelini
Designer : Collin Caulfield
Coach : Ara Jung
